articles.title: UK helped Ukraine and US reach ceasefire agreement - BBC.com
articles.description: Sir Keir Starmer led European efforts to mend Trump-Zelensky relationship, UK government sources tell the BBC.
articles.content:
Damian Grammaticas
The UK was "intimately involved" in helping Ukraine and the US reach an agreement over a proposed ceasefire deal with Russia, according to UK government sources.
